Event 2

Jul 20, 2016

Then when he died of dysentery, he gave me the watch. I hid this uncomfortable piece of metal up my ass for two years. Then, after seven years, I was sent home to my family. And now, little man, I give the watch to you.

Women. Nothing surprises me Chip, except your late mother. Who’da thought Selina had a brain to damage. Bottom line, she tries to blackmail me, I’ll drop her out a higher window. Meantime, I got better fish to fry.
